about_the_game:
Step into the Shadows


Enter the haunting halls of Whisper Manor, where the boundaries between past and present blur in a tale of unspeakable horror and hidden secrets. As a seasoned investigator, you are drawn to this cursed mansion by its dark reputation, but what lies within its walls is far beyond anything you could ever imagine.

Explore the eerie rooms, uncover long-buried truths, and follow the whispers of the lost as you unravel a chilling story of tragedy and terror. Every corner of this mansion hides a secret, every shadow conceals a lurking threat. But be warned—the deeper you delve, the closer you come to awakening the malevolence that festers within.

Can you survive the whispers that echo through the night?

An Immersive Horror Experience


With intense gameplay and a gripping narrative, Whisper offers a horror experience that will keep you on edge from start to finish. Solve intricate puzzles, confront terrifying entities, and brave the unknown in this atmospheric first-person horror game.

Are you ready to unveil the dark secrets that Whisper Manor has kept hidden for so long?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Works on both (32/64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or higher (Recommended)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Wear headphones and play in the dark and CALM DOWN

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Works on both (32/64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or higher (Recommended)
  • Additional Notes: Wear headphones and play in the dark and CALM DOWN

short_description: Whisper is a chilling first-person horror game set in a haunted mansion filled with dark secrets and eerie whispers. As an investigator, explore the shadowy corridors, solve haunting puzzles, and uncover the tragic past of Whisper Manor. Will you survive the terror within?

English*, Turkish
